BIOSUMMARY.text: For the past five years, I’ve worked across data science, machine learning, full-stack software engineering and highly technical Salesforce development, solving complex problems and delivering impactful, scalable solutions. At PyBootcamp School, I progressed from student technical mentor to tech lead, where I implemented machine learning models that increased student retention, student NPS and built automated systems that boosted operational efficiency by over 70%, allowing revenue capture and savings of over $1.5 million dollars. I thrived in balancing technical leadership with hands-on work, from coding predictive models to optimising cloud infrastructure.

foundingStory.description: a personal finance app that helps users automatically track their spending and save. As the sole developer, I've managed the entire technical stack—designing the backend, building the frontend, and handling cloud infrastructure.
foundingStory.nextSteps: The app, now in the live user testing phase on the Google Play Store, reflects my passion for developing user-centric products and exploring their commercial potential.

CareerGoals.lookingFor: opportunities where I can continue to lead technically while remaining hands-on with engineering.
CareerGoals.focus: roles in fintech, AI, or data-driven startups that value innovation and scalability.
CareerGoals.longTermGoals: grow into a deeply technical machine learning software engineer and tech leader, all while continuing to code, design algorithms and shape cutting-edge products.

PROFESSIONALEXPERIENCE.description: Ted is the sole developer behind Hai, as a personal finance app helping users track expenses and identify savings opportunities.
Led critical technical projects, focusing on hands-on development, data science, and machine learning work to drive organisational impact.

Built and deployed a highly accurate (90%) NPS prediction model in Salesforce using its in-built Einstein Analytics Prediction builder, enabling proactive student retention strategies and enhancing overall student support services.
Performed statistical validation of trips data from the tractor fleet, ensuring accuracy in tracking acreage covered and overall performance.
Automated data collection processes with a custom Python webscraper, improving database update efficiency by 5%

PROFESSIONALEXPERIENCE.company: MTN Digital Academy, PyBootcamp School, Kigali, Rwanda
PROFESSIONALEXPERIENCE.description: Led the pioneering Android development class, teaching Java and mobile app development to MTN Digital Academy students, achieving a 4.9/5 mentor satisfaction rating.
